goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 634kB)
indicator_name: Proportion of countries where the legal framework (including customary law) guarantees women’s equal rights to land ownership and/or control
target: Undertake reforms to give women equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to ownership and control over land and other forms of property, financial services, inheritance and natural resources, in accordance with national laws
graph_title: Proportion of countries where the legal framework (including customary law) guarantees women’s equal rights to land ownership and/or control
title: Untitled
local_indicator_definition: Does Namibia provide for the allocation of rights in respect of communal land; to establish Communal Land Boards; to provide for the powers of Chiefs and Traditional Authorities and boards in relation to communal land; and to make provision for incidental matters.
